justification: A offers B a healthy Tier 1 RB and top TE for B’s possession WR and a questionable RB, but claims A “upgrades” at RB—internally inconsistent. It ignores A’s injury-avoidance (A would add two questionable players) and B’s stated preference for possession WRs (they give up Thomas). Minimal explicit reasoning about B’s incentives or roster needs; TE not a clear need for B. Brief, inaccurate rationale.
